subtests.name: text setRangeText with only one argument replaces the value between selectionStart and selectionEnd, otherwise replaces the value between 2nd and 3rd arguments
text selectionMode missing
text selectionMode 'select'
text selectionMode 'start'
text selectionMode 'end'
text selectionMode 'preserve'
text setRangeText with 3rd argument greater than 2nd argument throws an IndexSizeError exception
text setRangeText without argument throws a type error
text setRangeText fires a select event
text setRangeText fires a select event when fully selected
text setRangeText fires a select event after select()
